official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the economic collapse of WorldCom Inc.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress regarding: (1) an investigation into the alleged wrongdoings related to the economic collapse of WorldCom Inc.; and (2) holding accountable, to the fullest extent of the law, any person who is found to have illegally withheld information or disseminated misleading information regarding WorldCom's financial condition.
